Class FESI.Data.ValueDescription 

FESI.Data.ValueDescription
public class ValueDescription
A ValueDescription is used to describe the property or field of an object (for debugging tools).

name
The name of this value (for example the property name if it is a property), null if not known or irrelevant.
type
The string describing the type of this value.
value
The string describing the value.

ValueDescription(String, String)
Build a value descriptor for an unknown name
ValueDescription(String, String, String)
Build a value descriptor for a specified name

toString()

name 
 public String name
The name of this value (for example the property name if it is a property), null if not known or irrelevant.

type 
 public String type
The string describing the type of this value.

value 
 public String value
The string describing the value.

ValueDescription 
 public ValueDescription(String type,
                         String value)
Build a value descriptor for an unknown name

ValueDescription 
 public ValueDescription(String name,
                         String type,
                         String value)
Build a value descriptor for a specified name
